Reference

Main functions

Functions to perform post hoc inference for one- and two sample tests as described in the BNR (2020) paper

calibrateJER()

Calibration of joint Family-Wise Error Rate thresholds

confidenceEnvelope()

Confidence envelope on the true/false positives among most significant items

volcanoPlot()

Volcano plot

maxFP()

Upper bound for the number of false discoveries in a selection

minTP()

Lower bound for the number of true discoveries in a selection

curveMaxFP()

Upper bound for the number of false discoveries among most significant items

Structured hypotheses

Functions to perform post hoc inference for structured hypotheses as described in the Durand et al. (2020) paper

V.star()

Post hoc bound on the number of false positives

zetas.tree() zetas.tree.refined()

Estimate of the proportion of true nulls in each node of a tree

Contents

Developed by Gilles Blanchard, Guillermo Durand, Pierre Neuvial, Etienne Roquain.
